tha-ap546:16.3: Vissāmabhūmi santānaṁ → vissāsaṁ bhūmisantānaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); vissānabhūmi santānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap546:25.3: Paccājāto → pacchā jāto (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sampatto ca (mr)
tha-ap546:28.4: sāriputtamahaddasaṁ → … mathaddasaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sāriputtañca addasaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap546:30.4: yugamattaṁ nidakkhitaṁ → yugamattanirikkhataṁ (bj); udikkhataṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); yugamattaṁ nirikkhitaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap546:31.2: avocaṁ mamanucchavaṁ → avocaṁ mananucchavaṁ (bj); avocamananucchavaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); avocaṁ mananucchaviṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap546:35.4: kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi → saccaṁ vaṅgīsa kacci te (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
